eda api kadugannawedi pasukara enakota mawa yalith athadanguwata ganna bawata rawayak giya.boho aya sithuwe aththatama athadanguwata ganiwi kiyalayi.eeth eda eya wune nathath idiriyedi eya siduwiya hakiyi.pagamana nisa bhithiyata pathwa sitina yahapalana aanduwa yalith mawa athadanguwata ganimata salasum karana bawak penawa.atham witeka labana sathiye me thiruwa siragedara sita liwimatada siduwiya hakiyi.eeth pagamane awasanaye danenne sathutak.janathawa pidawata pathwa sitina awasthawe janatha mathaya aanduwata danwimata hakiyawa labima apata sathutak.pa gamanata pamini,sahabhagi wu sama denatama sthuthi kirimata meya awasthawak kara gannawa.janamadhyayatath,samaja madhya ka්riyakaruwantath sthuthiyi.

mahajana bankuwa, brawuns saha samagama, daglas saha puthrayo saha siyat aayathana sama anugrahakayan lesa katayuthu karathi.mudritha madhya anugrahaya daranu labanne simasahitha eksath prawruththi pathra samagama (lekhawus) wisini.tharagawaliye labena siyalu aadayam guwan hamuda sewa wanitha eekakaya haraha guwan hamuda sewa pudgalayange suba sadhana katayuthu sandaha yedewe.me tharagawaliya sambandhawa madhya danuwath kirime hamuwak pasugiyada guwan hamuda mulasthanayedi guwan hamudapathi eyar mashal harsha abewikrama mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathwini.shri lanka motar ratha dhawakayange saha yathuru padi dhawakayange sangamaye sabhapathi yoga perera, lanka bankuwe sahakara samanyadhikari pi.je. jayasinha, brawuns saha samagame samanyadhikari panduka wirasinha, siyat aayathanaye welenda ha alewi upa sabhapathi rawi dudlani, mahajana bankuwe koparet intarnashanal markatin niyojya samanyadhikari chandani wirapitiya yana mahathma mahathmihu da madhya hamuwata ekwuha..

mama sthirawama elesa kiwwe mita perada ma me aakarayema kunu konthraththuwak nomilayema sarthakawa karadi thibu bawini.ee ape game siti shri lanka nidahas pakshaye aadharakaruwekutaya.ohutada me widiyatama marana tharjanaya sahitha liyuma labunawita danwim liya alewwe mamaya.eeta pasuwa ohuta deshapremingen kisima karadarayak siduwune natha.ethek wela hithe kakaremin thibu marana baya pahawa giya tash paratawi boho sahalluwen ma samaga katha karamin sitiyaya.aya mage wisthara wimasuwaya.rajaye rassawakuth karana ma ben eke nawathi sitinne ayidayi ayata danagannata uwamana wi thibini.kellange kuthuhalaya ehemaya.kellange me nosansindena kuthuhalaya thama wasiyata kalamanakaranaya karagath sira wani un hakuru maduwe nambaara gatissiyan siyallatama ekinekata horen lod bagaththe kellange lingika kuthuhalayata pinsidda wannataya.kuthuhalaya sansinduwa ganimen thamanta nam sathapahakata wadak nathi bawath labenne puka pura tinkiri pamanak bawath kellan therum ganna wita perahara gos hamaraya.owunge me kuthuhalaya samanya awasthawaladi pamanak nowa maranayak wani khedajanaka awasthawanhi pawa ekase balapawathwana bawa magema athdakimak asuren pahadili karannata puluwana.
habayi, rajapaksha pawula wage ma, rawi karunanayakath thanikarama horakama wenuwen pawathina aya nemeyi.

emenas ema kriyamarga thutha merata hathalis panlakshayak pamana sisu daruwange adhyapana ayithinta menma shri lanka guru ha widuhalpathi sewawalata ella wemin thibena abiyoga pilibandawath mehidi pululwa sakachcha kara ee sambandhawa elambaena idiri wasara thula gatha yuthu idiri kriyamarga pilipandawath mehidi yojana sammatha karaganna ladi.
